origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.get_expenses', 'description': 'This function retrieves the financial expenses of a specified company in a given category and period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'category', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The category of expenses, e.g., logistics technology, marketing, etc.'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which expenses are to be retrieved, e.g., last year, last quarter, etc.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'expenses', 'description': 'The total expenses in the specified category and period.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.get_expenses, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'京东', 'category'是'物流技术研发', 'period'是'过去五年'.
